page.title: 06GOVERNMENT:LOUTH(WOLDS)AREA
page.content:
Scamblesby,Goulceby and Asterby lie within the{EAST LINDSEY}Parliamentary Constituency.The seat is currently held by Sir{Peter Tapsell}who is a Conservative back-bencher.{ { { Cyril Turner,}Conservative,of Ludford,has been the area's representative on the Lincolnshire County Council since 1981.He sits on the Education,Leisure & Recreation and Transportation & Planning Commitees.
The East Lindsey District Council is responsible for housing,planning and environmental services.{Michael Beard, Liberal,is the District Councillor,and sits on the Housing,Material Resourses and General Purposes Committees.
